description: Deletes the specified dataview. Before deleting a dataview, make sure that it is not in use by any cluster.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment, from where you want to delete the dataview.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database whose dataview you want to delete.

parameters.name: dataviewName
parameters.description: The name of the dataview that you want to delete.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
